Great location friendly staff and clean comfortable rooms

1: But on a tropical island what is to be expected right‍ ♂ ️ The housekeeping staff did a decent job but I believe that fresh towels and ENOUGH bathroom tissue should be a priority not an option
Also the television which comes in handy when you have small children in the room on a rainy day and it WILL RAIN has really poor service as does the WiFi

Trying to pay room service fees also took a couple of hours the staff was leaving the room door open and gave wrong instructions that would have led to double pay as they did not cooperate with the front desk
it was THREE hours to get service and get food
The wait staff had no interest in our table even after we asked a couple of times
Staff hospitality was a hit or miss with some great and others clearly depressed demotivated and not caring less about being there
food is horrible and service in the restaurant is lengthy and terrible
However the new staff needs training on customer service please
